meanings.definition: Strong and sturdy in build or physique.
meanings.sent1: The buirdly oak tree stood tall in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker was buirdly and able to lift heavy materials with ease.
meanings.sent3: The buirdly wrestler accidentally broke the flimsy chair when he sat down.
meanings.sent4: His buirdly presence filled the room, commanding attention from everyone.
meanings.sent5: The buirdly mountain loomed in the distance, its massive form dominating the landscape.

meanings.definition: Having a large and robust body.
meanings.sent1: The buirdly horse galloped gracefully across the field.
meanings.sent2: The bear was buirdly, with a thick fur coat to keep it warm in winter.
meanings.sent3: The buirdly cat tried to squeeze into the tiny box, but it was too big.
meanings.sent4: His buirdly frame made him a formidable opponent on the rugby field.
meanings.sent5: The buirdly elephant trumpeted loudly, its massive body moving with surprising agility.
